channel.title: UltraHDR on JacksBlog
channel.description: Recent content in UltraHDR on JacksBlog

item.title: Jumping on the Trend: A Quick Analysis of the X2D II 100C File Format
item.description: Hasselblad HNCS HDR outputs Ultra HDR JPEG with Gainmap and P3 color via Phocus, the first medium format camera with end-to-end HDR.

item.title: HDR Image Formats Explained (III): UltraHDR and MPF
item.description: Identify UltraHDR images by detecting hdrgm:Version=1.0 in the JPEG's XMP metadata, per Google's spec, which includes a primary image and gainmap for HDR rendering.
